posts.post_content: Searching for Eddie Collins card from playing days. Prefer affordable low grade for HOF collection.

I have a PC 796 Eddie Collins in SGC 35, if you are interested. $800

I don't log on to Net54 often. 

Email me at: [url]jvb6034@aol.com[/url]

[url]https://net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=1275&pictureid=28595[/url]


Edit to add: David, Please let me know one way or the other. I have another offer on this card that is on hold until you make a decision. Thanks!

Edit #2: Card will be available until 6:00 pm, Friday, 03/05. Thanks.

Edit #3: Sorry man! Have to move on.
I got a nice Eddie Collins postcard I'd  trade or consider selling.
